THE STARTUP NETWORK

aircrft/startups

Startups helping startups

Aircrft is a collaboration hub that enables startup founders and teams
to share what their working on at the moment, give insights and knowledge,
get support, and help other startups.

Explore
STARTUP COLLABORATION NETWORK

How it works

Aircft is a collaboration hub that enables founders and teams to create, collaborate, publish, and share.

1

Culture deck

Share your purpose, your why, mission, and values. Craft, collaborate, and publish your startup culture deck.

2

Attract top talent

Post job openings that enables applicants to search and apply to your startup based on culture, mission, and values.

3

Escape velocity

Aircrft is mission control for attracting top talent and scaling a world-class vibrant company culture.

Developing a conscious culture is a business imperative. It enables the execution of the organizations strategy, the achievement of its goals, and the fulfillment of its mission.

Fred Kofman Author, Conscious Business
